languages.text: {n}Ксенос облачена в искусно инкрустированные доспехи и держится спокойно подле говорящего. Такое поведение свойственно ксеносам верхних ступеней друкарской иерархии, а значит — перед вами одна из архонтов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос облачена в искусно инкрустированные доспехи и держится спокойно подле говорящего. Такое поведение свойственно ксеносам верхних ступеней друкарской иерархии, а значит — перед вами одна из архонтов.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

languages.text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос облачена в искусно инкрустированные доспехи и держится спокойно подле говорящего. Такое поведение свойственно ксеносам верхних ступеней друкарской иерархии, а значит — перед вами одна из архонтов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is wearing an elaborately inlaid suit of armour and is safely standing close to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos on the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the archons.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is wearing an elaborately inlaid suit of armour and is safely standing close to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos on the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the archons.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

languages.text: {n}这位异形穿着镶有珠宝的盔甲，平静地站在发言人身边。这样的举止明显属于黑暗灵族的高层人物。这意味着，你眼前的这个人是其中一位执政官。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位异形穿着镶有珠宝的盔甲，平静地站在发言人身边。这样的举止明显属于黑暗灵族的高层人物。这意味着，你眼前的这个人是其中一位执政官。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

languages.text: {n}異種族は宝石に覆われた防具を身につけており、話者の隣に静かに立っている。このような振る舞いはデュカーリの階級の上位に位置する異種族の典型的なもので、目の前にいるのはアーコンのひとりであることがわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は宝石に覆われた防具を身につけており、話者の隣に静かに立っている。このような振る舞いはデュカーリの階級の上位に位置する異種族の典型的なもので、目の前にいるのはアーコンのひとりであることがわかる。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

languages.text: {n}La xenos está ataviada con una armadura con joyas incrustadas y permanece en pie junto al orador, tranquila. Su comportamiento es típico de los xenos de mayor rango en la jerarquía Drukhari, lo que significa que se trata de una de los Arcontes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La xenos está ataviada con una armadura con joyas incrustadas y permanece en pie junto al orador, tranquila. Su comportamiento es típico de los xenos de mayor rango en la jerarquía Drukhari, lo que significa que se trata de una de los Arcontes.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

languages.text: {n}Bardée d'une armure incrustée de gemmes, la xénos se tient calmement près de l'orateur. Son attitude, typique des échelons supérieurs de la hiérarchie des Drukharis, ne peut signifier qu'une chose : il s'agit de l'une des archontes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bardée d'une armure incrustée de gemmes, la xénos se tient calmement près de l'orateur. Son attitude, typique des échelons supérieurs de la hiérarchie des Drukharis, ne peut signifier qu'une chose : il s'agit de l'une des archontes.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

languages.text: {n}Die Xenos trägt eine Rüstung mit eingearbeiteten Juwelen und steht ruhig neben dem Sprechenden. Dieses Auftreten ist typisch für Xenos in den oberen Rängen der Drukhari-Hierarchie, was bedeutet, dass du es mit einer Archontin zu tun hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Xenos trägt eine Rüstung mit eingearbeiteten Juwelen und steht ruhig neben dem Sprechenden. Dieses Auftreten ist typisch für Xenos in den oberen Rängen der Drukhari-Hierarchie, was bedeutet, dass du es mit einer Archontin zu tun hast.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris

languages.text: {n}Zeno, mücevherlerle süslenmiş bir zırh giyiyor ve sakince konuşan varlığın yanında duruyor. Drukhari hiyerarşisinde üst mertebelerde bulunan bir zeno için tipik bir davranış sergiliyor. Bu da karşında Arkonlardan biri olduğu anlamına geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos is wearing armour encrusted with jewels and stands calmly next to the speaker. Such behaviour is typical of the xenos occupying the higher tiers of the Drukhari hierarchy, which means you are facing one of the Archons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno, mücevherlerle süslenmiş bir zırh giyiyor ve sakince konuşan varlığın yanında duruyor. Drukhari hiyerarşisinde üst mertebelerde bulunan bir zeno için tipik bir davranış. Bu da demek oluyor ki karşındaki, Arkonlardan biri.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Iremerris
